description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Travel a classic RPG land as Monster King, capturing monsters to fight for you!  Explore a world of ice, desert, and lava! Acquire gold, weapons, and armor on your quest to capture every monster, and meet NPCs on the way!  Some of them say hilarious things!
